name: Snakes & Ladder Multiplayer
description:
Snakes & Ladders 2016

-Multiplayer Games
-Login With Facebook

Welcome our new multiplayer game Snakes & Ladders .
this is an Advance version of Snakes & Ladders game.

the ladders are our best friends in this chutes and ladders game.

with 3 different mode.

Play vs computer

Play turn base

Play online with your Facebook friends.

Get Free life every day.

You can create your own board and invite your friends to play the game with you.

please support us with your Feedback so we can enhance UI experience in next update.
